settings.navbar_classes: h-[48px] md:h-[56px] lg:[83px] w-full z-10 bg-white
settings.container_classes: border-y-[1px] lg:border-x-[1px] border-brand-black flex justify-between h-full
settings.navbar__menu_left: hidden lg:flex h-full w-1/2 justify-start pl-[1px]
settings.navbar__menu_right: hidden lg:flex h-full w-1/2 justify-end pr-[1px]
settings.left_menu_item_classes: text-brand-black hover:text-gray-900 border-brand-black border-r-[1px] flex items-center justify-center w-1/4
settings.right_menu_item_classes: text-brand-black hover:text-gray-900 border-brand-black border-l-[1px] flex items-center justify-center w-1/4
settings.desktop_cart_button_classes: transition ease-in-out hover:-translate-y-1 hover:scale-110 duration-300 flex items-center justify-center  w-full h-full gap-2
settings.menu_button_container_classes: flex items-center justify-center aspect-square border-brand-black border-x lg:hidden
settings.mobile_cart_button_classes: flex items-center justify-center aspect-square border-brand-black border-x lg:hidden
settings.menu_overlay_classes: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-40 transition-opacity duration-300 ease-in-out opacity-0 pointer-events-none lg:hidden
settings.off_canvas_menu_container_classes: fixed inset-y-0 left-0 w-full md:w-[384px] bg-white z-50 transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out transform -translate-x-full lg:hidden border border-brand-black
settings.off_canvas_menu_header_classes: h-[47px] md:h-[55px] border-b border-brand-black flex items-center justify-start pl-6
settings.off_canvas_menu_content_classes: text-mobile-heading-5 md:text-desktop-heading-5 text-brand-black font-medium h-[calc(100%_-_47px)] md:h-[calc(100%_-_55px)] overflow-y-scroll
settings.off_canvas_more_menu: flex flex-col gap-4 border-b border-brand-black font-medium p-6
settings.off_canvas_menu_social: flex border-b border-brand-black font-medium p-6 justify-between

settings.cart_content_delivery_message: Shipping & taxes calculated at checkout Free standard shipping within Kyiv
settings.cart_overlay_classes: fixed inset-0 bg-black bg-opacity-50 z-40 transition-opacity duration-300 ease-in-out opacity-0 pointer-events-none block
settings.cart_container_classes: fixed inset-y-0 right-0 w-full lg:w-1/2 bg-white z-50 transition-transform duration-300 ease-in-out transform translate-x-full flex flex-col overflow-y-auto
settings.cart_header_classes: px-6 py-3 flex justify-between items-center h-[48px] md:h-[56px] border-brand-black border-b md:px-10 md:py-4 lg:py-[26px]
settings.cart_content_added_product_class: px-4 py-6 flex flex-col gap-4 border-brand-black border-b md:p-10 md:flex-row md:justify-between
settings.cart_content_textarea_div: px-4 py-6 border-brand-black border-b flex-grow md:p-10
settings.cart_content_textarea_div_content_messag: w-full border border-gray-300 text-mobile-body h-full overflow-y-auto p-2 outline-none
settings.cart_content_checkout_button_classes: block text-center text-mobile-button uppercase w-full h-full bg-brand-black text-white hover:bg-gray-800 transition-colors duration-200 px-6 pt-4 pb-[14px] tracking-[0.025em] md:text-desktop-button md:tracking-[0.03em]
